work_reference_numbers.description:
Array values must be unique
Must not contain null or undefined values
Array max length 1000
Work reference numbers have a max length 24 characters

info.title: reporting-api
info.description:
See API specification Resource Guide > Reporting API for more information on paging and endpoints
NOTE: Swagger Editor/UI does not display all description text for enumerations and child elements, check swagger.json for full description text

get.description:
Returns all alterations associated with the logged in user's organisation. Optional date range filter for date_created
Authenticated user must have one of the following roles: Planner, Contractor, HighwayAuthority

See API specification Resource Guide > Reporting API > Get Permits for more information
Authenticated user must have one of the following roles: Planner, Contractor, HighwayAuthority

post.description: Authenticated user must have one of the following roles: Planner, Contractor, HighwayAuthority
